questions.question: In compression test, fracture in cast iron specimen would occur along

answers.a: Right angle to axis of specimen

questions.question: In compression testing increasing in buckling is due to

answers.a: Increase in length to diameter ratio
answers.b: Decrease in length to diameter ratio
answers.c: Doesn't depend on length to diameter ratio
strong in both tension and compression
answers.d: weak in both tension and compression

questions.question: Gold, cast irons, copper are ductile materials. Silver, concrete are brittle materials.(Say true or false)

The shape of specimen used in compression test is
  1. i. Cube
  2. ii. Cylinder
  3. iii. Cuboid
  4. iv. Prism
